title: Why can't I use the legacy client in Korean after the 7.5 patch?

replies.body: The Korean client is specific to that region and different than the client on NA/EU.  Your best bet would be to download the supported client [here](https://signup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload).   Each region also has their own [supported language](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594-Changing-Game-Language), and we're unable to assist with any modifications to change your language or technical issue that may come up as a result.  Your best bet would be to download the correct client and use the supported language.  Hope that helps clear things up!
